Package repast.simphony.ui.widget

Class DropDownButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • repast.simphony.ui.widget.DropDownButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class DropDownButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
    A JButton that shows a little arrow icon on it. When the user clicks in the area of that icon it will pop up a given menu. If the user clicks anywhere else the first menu item will be executed.
    Author:
    Jerry Vos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
